title: O.D.G. Original Design Gangsta
content:
Thought some of you might get a kick out of [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821141836/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=yJexyQT0l1c).

Representin’ Rosewood, as well as some other shout outs.

Fresh for the ’07 suckas! :)

 [‹ Legato & points](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821141836/http:/www.typophile.com/node/7740 "Go to previous forum topic") [Helvetica Neue == Neue Helvetica? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821141836/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35810 "Go to next forum topic")
author: biddy

comments.content: Terry, that’s just hilarious! I’d take back every nasty thing I ever said about rap if it was all this funny. ;-)
Thank god for the subtitles, for the non-rappers in the house.
You mean _da house_, don’t you Don? ;-)

Thanks for the laugh. That was too funny!

Sharon
my friend and I were joking around in type class one day, and we made up rap-names for ourselves. My name was En-and-Em and his was Fitty Pt. Haha.
My rap name is “Biddy” as a matter of fact. ;)
